mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quiz (title,content,user_id, deleted,quiz_level,answer, created_at, modified_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{user.id},#{deleted},#{quizLevel},#{answer}, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO complete_quiz (created_at, modified_at, quiz_id, user_id) VALUES (NOW(),NOW(),#{quiz.id},#{user.id})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM quiz WHERE quiz_level = #{quizLevel} and deleted = 'UNDELETE'
SELECT id,title,content,quiz_level FROM quiz WHERE quiz_level = #{quizLevel} and deleted = 'UNDELETE'
SELECT id, quiz_level as quizLevel, IF(answer = #{answer}, true, false) AS isCorrect FROM quiz WHERE id = #{id} and deleted = 'UNDELETE'
SELECT q.id AS id FROM complete_quiz cq JOIN quiz q ON cq.quiz_id = q.id WHERE cq.user_id=#{id} and q.quiz_level = #{quizLevel} and q.deleted = 'UNDELETE'
SELECT id,title,content,quiz_level as quizLevel FROM quiz WHERE id>#{id} and quiz_level = #{quizLevel} and deleted = 'UNDELETE'
